Module com.example.cab222a
Package com.example.cab222a.controller.core

Class SqliteControllerFunctions<T extends com.example.cab222a.model.core.NamedObject>

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab222a.controller.core.SqliteControllerFunctions<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of object the DAO will be interacting with.
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExerciseInfoController, ResistTrainExerciseController, ResistTrainSessionController, ResistTrainSetController
public abstract class SqliteControllerFunctions<T extends com.example.cab222a.model.core.NamedObject> extends Object
Abstract class that contains commonly used elements and functions for interacting with Data Access Objects (DAOs).
